snippet: A new chief executive for the private equity company’s Japanese unit is the latest in a series of senior appointments for K.K.R. in Asia, as it seeks to close a new $6 billion Asian fund and expand regionally beyond the traditional buyout business.
abstract: A new chief executive for the private equity company’s Japanese unit is the latest in a series of senior appointments for K.K.R. in Asia, as it seeks to close a new $6 billion Asian fund and expand regionally beyond the traditional buyout business.

headline.main: K.K.R. Hires New Chief for Japanese Unit
